title: Short Elementary Level Stories Bundle 2: 3 Short Stories in 1 Ebook (Books about Santa, mystery, space, animals, planets, family) Perfect for kids under 10 learning to read!
description: Bundle "Ms. Crow's Concert", " The Memory Thief" and "Santa's Boots"These books tell the story of silly little animals, kids and other characters who are eager to learn and grow. You will love reading these to your young ones and watching them learn to read in the process.** Read it FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership **Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren.
author: Betty J. Byers
